column1: #Text=Wan says : " Do you see that , Mula ?
#Text=I have got to get over there .
#Text=Um , sorry to interrupt , but it 's been a while since I 've seen other humans .
#Text=" Nomad says : " Where did you come from , stranger ?
#Text=" Wan says : " Another lion turtle city far away .
#Text=For the past two years I 've been living among the spirits and exploring the wilds .
#Text=We would love to hear of your travels .
#Text=" Vaatu says : " So , we meet again , human .
#Text=" Nomad says : " Why is the great spirit of the darkness here but not his other half ?
#Text=" Wan says : " Uh , I 'll explain later .
#Text=" Vaatu says : " How are you feeling since our split , Raava ?
#Text=When Harmonic Convergence comes , I will destroy you forever .
#Text=" Raava says : " I told you not to interfere .
#Text=" Wan says : " I had to do something .
#Text=" Nomad says : " Great spirit of light , we thank you for your help .
#Text=But how did you become split from Vaatu ?
#Text=" Wan says : " It was n't my fault .
#Text=I 'd take it all back if I could .
#Text=" Raava says : " It 's too late for that .
#Text=Now that Vaatu is free , he is turning other spirits dark .
#Text=The more spirits he turns , the stronger he becomes .
#Text=" Wan says : " He 's getting bigger , and you 're getting smaller .
#Text=" Raava says : " As darkness grows , light fades .
#Text=" Wan says : " I 'm sorry for endangering your village , but I promise to set things right .
